content: I do not have personal opinions or preferences, nor am i capable of keeping up with events like humans do. however, i can tell you that many hockey east games have been played during the pandemic, with various health and safety measures in place to keep players, coaches, and staff members safe. the league has limited in-person attendance, and many games have been televised or streamed online, providing fans with some form of engagement while making sure that the risks of transmission are minimized. while the games may not be the same without fans in the stands, the teams have been able to continue playing, and fans have been able to watch them compete in a safer way during these challenging times.
